casebody.data:
Rochelle DRIESSEN, Appellant,
v.
The SCHOOL BOARD OF MIAMI-DADE COUNTY, Florida, et al., Appellees. No. 3D18-1191 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Third District. Opinion filed September 26, 2018 Rochelle Driessen, in proper person. Walter J. Harvey, Miami-Dade County School Board Attorney, and Mary C. Lawson, Assistant Miami-Dade County School Board Attorney, for appellee The School Board of Miami-Dade County, Florida. Before SALTER, EMAS and SCALES, JJ. PER CURIAM.

Affirmed.
